item.title: Blog Motivation
item.description: Typically I track my technical note taking using Notion. This works well as a personal wiki for everything I learn where the smaller details are likely to slip out of my brain in the future! The premise of this blog is to build on these notes with a more formal summary for future reference (and hopefully help sharpen my knowledge on the subject matter) In some way this is inspired by the many hours I spend reading on medium
